kpi.name: M1009C288

kpi_info.title: LTE CS HHO IN PREP REQ
kpi_info.use: The number of incoming LTE CS SRVCC ISHO preparation requests. M1009C243 is also updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When the RNC receives RANAP: RELOCATION REQUEST from the CS CN asking for inter-RAT handover and the request is identified to come from LTE ("UE history information" IE included), all causes are included except "CS fallback".

kpi.kpi_alias: LTE CS HHO IN PREP REQ
